SEARCH
Package com.tradingcards.elements.binder

Class BinderController

java.lang.Object
com.tradingcards.elements.binder.BinderController
public class BinderController extends Object
Controller class for managing binder-related actions within the trading card collection application. Handles logic for adding/removing binders and cards, as well as trading cards between binders and the main collection.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a BinderController with the shared collection, model, and view.

  • Constructor Details

    • BinderController

      public BinderController(CollectionModel sharedCollection, BinderView view)
      Constructs a BinderController with the shared collection, model, and view.
      Parameters:
      sharedCollection - the central collection of trading card elements
      view - the view handling user interaction for binders

  • Method Details

    • addBinder

      public void addBinder()
      Adds a new binder to the shared collection. Prompts the user for a binder name and ensures the name is unique.

    • removeBinder

      public void removeBinder()
      Removes a binder from the shared collection based on user input. All cards in the binder are returned to the main card collection.

    • displayBinders

      public void displayBinders()
      Displays all binders currently stored in the collection.

    • displaySingleBinder

      public void displaySingleBinder()
      Displays the contents of a single binder selected by the user.

    • displayBinderContent

      public void displayBinderContent(HashMap<String,CardModel> binder)
      Displays the contents of the specified binder.
      Parameters:
      binder - the map of cards inside the binder

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard()
      Removes a card from a specified binder and returns it to the main card collection. Prompts the user to select a binder and card to remove.

    • addCard

      public void addCard()
      Transfers a card from the shared collection into a specific binder. Constraints: A binder can only hold up to 20 unique cards.

    • tradeCard

      public void tradeCard()
      Trades a card from a binder with a new card from the collection. The trade is allowed based on the card value difference. User has the option to cancel a trade if conditions are not favorable.

    • createCardCopy

      public static CardModel createCardCopy(CardModel originalCard)
      Creates a deep copy of a given CardModel, initializing it with quantity 1.
      Parameters:
      originalCard - the card to copy
      Returns:
      a new CardModel object with the same values as the original
